title: Prophet

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you die, all players who have visited you (except for your attackers) become your Disciples, and are announced to town. Disciples have a night chat with you, and you can speak to them from beyond the grave.
- After three days of being dead, you are revived if you have at least one living Disciple. If this happens, you and your Disciples gain basic defense permanently.
- Other Peasants cannot be Disciples.
- While you are dead but have an alive Disciple, you are counted as living for the purposes of the Peasants win condition.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Die and be reborn into the town with at least 2 living Disciples.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4219
*Flesh gives birth to flesh, but the Spirit gives birth to spirit.*
